original_text: “‘When a man is cleansed from his discharge, he is to count off seven days for his ceremonial cleansing; he must wash his clothes and bathe himself with fresh water, and he will be clean.
korean_text: 유출병이 있는 자는 그의 유출이 깨끗해지거든 그가 정결하게 되기 위하여 이레를 센 후에 옷을 빨고 흐르는 물에 그의 몸을 씻을 것이라 그러면 그가 정하리니

sentences.original_text: When a man is cleansed from his discharge
sentences.korean_translation: 한 사람이 유출로부터 정결케 될 때

sentences.original_text: he is to count off seven days
and bathe himself with fresh water
